name: Helicoopter
description:
[ESP]

El juego consiste en rescatar a Juan y a Cuco del balcón donde se han quedado encerrado sin explicación alguna a partir de un helicóptero para devolverlos a otro balcón donde continuaran encerrados.

Helicoopter es un juego realizada para la game jam Gameja Navideja 2023. Se ha realizado el prototipo en 3 días y con el único objetivo de pasarlo bien.

Es de obligada jugación coop, disfrutalo con tu primo, tu abuela, tu novie o bueno puedes jugarlo a dos manos.

Ama a Juan, Rescata a Juan, Respeta a Juan.

[ENG]

The game consists of rescuing Juan and Cuco from the balcony where they have been locked up without any explanation from a helicopter to return them to another balcony where they will continue locked up.

Helicoopter is a game made for the Gameja Navideja 2023 game jam. The prototype has been made in 3 days and with the unique objective of having fun.

It is a must play coop, enjoy it with your cousin, your grandmother, your girlfriend or well you can play it with two hands.

Love Juan, Rescue Juan, Respect Juan.
